html:
Rosie hasn‚Äôt been taking the best care of herself. She‚Äôs been so busy at work with all of the scientific papers she published last year that she hasn‚Äôt been eating as well as she should, and she hasn‚Äôt been exercising.

But that‚Äôs in the past now. It‚Äôs January 2025, and that means new year‚Äôs resolutions.

Fur starters‚Ä¶fitness! üò∏

Rosie got a membership to The Hello Kitty Bounce House, a new cat fitness gym.

It‚Äôs the latest craze in feline fitness. They say that 10 minutes of bouncing burns as many calories as 12 hours of napping! That sounded great to Rosie, so she signed up for a year.

But that‚Äôs not all. She also started playing pickleball.

Marnie was already an avid runner last year, so she didn‚Äôt officially set a ‚Äúfitness resolution,‚Äù but she did want to show her manager Rosie that she‚Äôs a team player‚Ä¶

So, she‚Äôs decided to try out for the new season of American Ninja Warrior!

Tabs, of course, was famous for his ambitious resolutions.

Interestingly, they usually involved fitness‚Ä¶ üò∫

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
